summary.en-US: P2P Bitcoin wallet with yield on dxBTC

description.en-US:
SUBFROST is a peer-to-peer Bitcoin wallet powered by the Subfrost protocol.
Deposit BTC, convert to dxBTC, and earn yield through decentralized finance.

Features:
* P2P Bitcoin transactions - no intermediaries
* dxBTC - wrapped Bitcoin that earns yield
* Decentralized network - connects directly to peers
* Privacy-focused - your keys, your coins
* Integrated secure tunnel for network privacy
* Open source and fully auditable

SUBFROST connects you to a decentralized network of peers, enabling
trustless Bitcoin operations without relying on centralized servers.
